artist: Pierre Alechinsky; Published by La Hune, Paris; Printed by Peter Bramsen
description: three separate "vignettes":  rectangular area at bottom in bold black strokes; blue image at top; small design with blotches and thin lines in upper right corner; organic, biomorphic abstract designs
marks: Signature, Date and Edition lower right corner, in pencil: [Alechinsky \'63]; l
medium: Etching and aquatint in blue and black inks
title: Avec plaisir
